text: Mountain Hill is an unincorporated community in Harris County, in the U.S. state of Georgia. ==History== A post office called Mountain Hill was established in 1853, and remained in operation until 1904. According to tradition, the community was so named because a first settler liked mountains. A variant name was "Talleytown". ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Harris County, Georgia
title: Mountain Hill, Georgia
